item.title: Installing Git on a Shared Host
item.description: <img src="/media/git-logo.png" /> Git is a fantastic tool and is very useful for deployment. If you can’t install git system wide or don’t want to mess with installing it on the entire system here is an easy way to install it for a single user. This also works well on Mac OS X where installing git is more challenging than necessary. Script included I used this script to install git on 1and1.
